Thanks again! Though I don't think that's the one I saw. If my recollection is correct, it was very close to `padarray`, in the sense that it had different options for what to return beyond the edge. CircularArrays does not have everything I'm looking for (e.g., repeating the edge value), and padded views has a single fill value from what I can tell, so cannot do the repeating either...
